activeEffect.name: Ebb
activeEffect.description: Stores one Flow Point. Damage Taken -10%.

activeEffect.name: Flow Point
activeEffect.description: Expend Flow Points to take actions. Up to 3 can be stored/used at once.

activeEffect.name: Overflow Point
activeEffect.description:
Generated every time user takes a Reserve Action.

After 3 are generated, consumes 3 Overflow Points to generate 1 Flow Point.

Flow Points in the Reserve Party may be given to the Active Party or saved until you enter the Active Party.

activeEffect.name: Brace
activeEffect.description:
Damage Taken -50%. Stamina/Focus Regen +25%.

Halves Armor Ignore.

activeEffect.name: Rest
activeEffect.description:
Triggers Health Regen. Stamina/Focus Regen +50%.

Restores 1 Purity.

activeEffect.name: Brace Shield
activeEffect.description:
Damage Taken -50%. Stamina/Focus Regen +25%.

Halves Armor Ignore.

Protects Adjacent Allies, taking Damage for them. AoE Skills do not pierce beyond user.

activeEffect.name: Brace Provoke
activeEffect.description:
Damage Taken -50%. Stamina/Focus Regen +25%.

Halves Armor Ignore.

Forces a chosen Enemy within 6 Spaces to target user.

activeEffect.name: Brace Counter
activeEffect.description:
Damage Taken -50%. Stamina/Focus Regen +25%.

Halves Armor Ignore.

Basic Counterattacks when attacked.

activeEffect.name: Rest Counter
activeEffect.description:
Triggers Health Regen. Stamina/Focus Regen +50%.

Restores 1 Purity.

Skill Counterattacks when attacked.

activeEffect.name: Rest Taunt
activeEffect.description:
Triggers Health Regen. Stamina/Focus Regen +50%.

Restores 1 Purity.

Draws Aggro from all Enemies within 4 Spaces.

activeEffect.name: Unconscious
activeEffect.description: Cannot act. At the start of the round, triggers all Regens.

activeEffect.name: Dead
activeEffect.description: Cannot act.

activeEffect.name: Broken
activeEffect.description:
Cannot act. Armor Disabled for a round.

After expiring, Break Damage Taken -25%, Armor -10% for remainder of encounter.

activeEffect.name: Break Stack
activeEffect.description: Break Damage Taken -[Stack x25]%, Armor -[Stack x10]% for remainder of encounter.

activeEffect.name: Bursted
activeEffect.description:
Disables all Damage and Status immunities/resistances. Suffer an extra Basic Attack per action used on you, regardless of action and range.

After expiring, Burst Damage Taken -25%, Power -1, and Status Slots +1 for remainder of encounter.

activeEffect.name: Burst Stack
activeEffect.description: Burst Damage Taken -[Stack x25]%, Power -[Stack], and Status Slots +[Stack] for remainder of encounter.

activeEffect.name: Blasted
activeEffect.description: Unused.

activeEffect.name: Blast Stack
activeEffect.description: Unused.

activeEffect.name: Flying
activeEffect.description:
Counts as Flying.

Immune to terrain effects.

activeEffect.name: Airborne
activeEffect.description:
Counts as Flying.

Immune to terrain effects.

activeEffect.name: Launch
activeEffect.description:
Counts as Flying.

Cannot have turn passed to, Counter, or React until Launch expires.

Launch automatically expires on your turn if there is no one else the turn can be passed to.

activeEffect.name: Dual Wielding
activeEffect.description:
Halves all Armor Values and self-applied sources of Damage Reduction.

Decreases Toughness >-3 to -3.

Elemental Resistances and Defensive Buffs granted by your allies are not halved.

After 1 FULL round, this effect can be removed by taking a non-Dual/Cross Wielding Action.

activeEffect.name: Brutish
activeEffect.description: Disables Armor for 1 round.

activeEffect.name: Health Regen
activeEffect.description: Health Regen is active.

activeEffect.name: Overdrive
activeEffect.description:
FP Generation +1, Damage Dealt +25%, Damage Taken -25%.

Cost/2, Movement x1.25.

At the end of the round, suffer -1d3 Drive. Return to normal at 0. Die sides increase by 1 for every 5 Maximum Drive.

activeEffect.name: Antidrive
activeEffect.description:
FP Generation =1d3, Damage Dealt +75%, Damage Taken +25%.

Cost = 0.

Instead of targeting normally, targets based on 1d6. [1-2: Ally, 3-4: Enemy, 5: Self, 6: Brace.]

At the end of the round, suffer -1d3 Drive. Return to normal at 0. Die sides increase by 1 for every 5 Maximum Drive.

activeEffect.name: Burn
activeEffect.description:
Deals 3 Fire Damage/round and disables Shield Health.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Blaze
activeEffect.description:
Deals 6 Fire Damage/round and disables Shield Health.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Incinerate
activeEffect.description:
Deals 9 Fire Damage/round and disables Shield Health.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Inferno
activeEffect.description:
Deals 12 Fire Damage/round and disables Shield Health.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Sublimate
activeEffect.description:
Deals 15 Fire Damage/round and disables Shield Health.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Frostbite
activeEffect.description:
Deals 2 Ice Damage/round, lowers Move by 3 and Speed by 2. (Min of 1.)

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Bitterfrost
activeEffect.description:
Deals 4 Ice Damage/round, lowers Move by 5 and Speed by 2. (Min of 1.)

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Permafrost
activeEffect.description:
Deals 6 Ice Damage/round, lowers Move by 7 and Speed by 3. (Min of 1.)

Lasts 4 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Everfrost
activeEffect.description:
Deals 9 Ice Damage/round, lowers Move by 9 and Speed by 4. (Min of 1.)

Lasts 4 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Deposition
activeEffect.description:
Deals 12 Ice Damage/round, sets Move and Speed to 1.

Lasts 4 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Chilled
activeEffect.description:
Increases Fire/Ice Damage Taken by 10% for 3 rounds.

Prevents actions for 1 round. Can also be cured with any Fire skill.

Does not increase Fire/Ice Damage Taken by Status Effects.

activeEffect.name: Frozen
activeEffect.description:
Increases Fire/Ice Damage Taken by 20% for 3 rounds.

Prevents actions for 1 round. Can also be cured with any Fire skill.

Does not increase Fire/Ice Damage Taken by Status Effects.

activeEffect.name: Hypothermic
activeEffect.description:
Deals 10 Ice Damage/round and increases Fire/Ice Damage Taken by 30% for 3 rounds.

Prevents actions for 1 round. Can also be cured with any Fire skill.

Does not increase Fire/Ice Damage Taken by Status Effects.

activeEffect.name: Crystalized
activeEffect.description:
Deals 12 Ice Damage/round and increases Fire/Ice Damage Taken by 40% for 3 rounds.

Prevents actions for 1 round. Can also be cured with any Tier 2+ Fire skill.

Does not increase Fire/Ice Damage Taken by Status Effects.

activeEffect.name: Fossilized
activeEffect.description:
Deals 15 Ice Damage/round and increases Fire/Ice Damage Taken by 50% for 3 rounds.

Prevents actions for 1 round. Can also be cured with any Tier 2+ Fire skill.

Does not increase Fire/Ice Damage Taken by Status Effects.

activeEffect.name: Static
activeEffect.description:
Before attack, self and allies within 2 spaces take 3 Thunder Damage.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Conductive
activeEffect.description:
Before attack, self and allies within 3 spaces take 5 Thunder Damage.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Electrocuted
activeEffect.description:
Before attack, self and allies within 4 spaces take 7 Thunder Damage.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Discharged
activeEffect.description:
Before attack, self and allies within 5 spaces take 10 Thunder Damage.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Overloaded
activeEffect.description:
Before attack, self and allies within 5 spaces take 12 Thunder Damage.

Lasts 4 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Frail
activeEffect.description:
Toughness -1. All attacks suffer 25% Recoil Air Damage.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Deficient
activeEffect.description:
Toughness -1. All attacks suffer 50% Recoil Air Damage.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Hollow
activeEffect.description:
Toughness -2. All attacks suffer 75% Recoil Air Damage.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Deterioration
activeEffect.description:
Toughness -2. All attacks suffer 100% Recoil Air Damage.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Distintegration
activeEffect.description:
Toughness -3. All attacks suffer 150% Recoil Air Damage.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Poison
activeEffect.description:
Deals 20% of current Health (Max 10 against enemies) in Ground Damage per round.

Will always leave at least 1 Health.

Quartered and flat against bosses.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Toxic
activeEffect.description:
Power -1. Deals 20% of current Health (Max 10 against enemies) in Ground Damage per round.

Will always leave at least 1 Health.

Quartered and flat against bosses.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Venom
activeEffect.description:
Power -2. Deals 20% of current Health (Max 15 against enemies) in Ground Damage per round.

Will always leave at least 1 Health.

Quartered and flat against bosses.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Hypertoxin
activeEffect.description:
Power -4. Deals 20% of current Health (Max 15 against enemies) in Ground Damage per round.

Will always leave at least 1 Health.

Quartered and flat against bosses.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Hypervenom
activeEffect.description:
Power -6. Deals 25% of current Health (Max 20 against enemies) in Ground Damage per round.

Will always leave at least 1 Health.

Quartered and flat against bosses.

Lasts 4 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Acid
activeEffect.description:
Deals 10% of Max Health in Ground Damage per round, increasing by 5% each round.

Will always leave at least 1 Health.

Halved and flat against bosses.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Corrosion
activeEffect.description:
Power -1. Deals 10% of Max Health in Ground Damage per round, increasing by 10% each round.

Will always leave at least 1 Health.

Halved and flat against bosses.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Erosion
activeEffect.description:
Power -2. Deals 10% of Max Health in Ground Damage per round, increasing by 10% each round.

Will always leave at least 1 Health.

Halved and flat against bosses.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Dissolve
activeEffect.description:
Power -4. Deals 10% of Max Health in Ground Damage per round, increasing by 10% each round.

Will always leave at least 1 Health.

Halved and flat against bosses.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Atomize
activeEffect.description:
Power -6. Deals 10% of Max Health in Ground Damage per round, increasing by 10% each round.

Will always leave at least 1 Health.

Halved and flat against bosses.

Lasts 4 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Charmed
activeEffect.description:
33% chance of using skill on ally instead of target, or reverse for recovery skills.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Captivated
activeEffect.description:
50% chance of using skill on ally instead of target, or reverse for recovery skills.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Enchanted
activeEffect.description:
GM takes round instead of player.

Lasts 1 round.

activeEffect.name: Dominated
activeEffect.description:
GM takes round instead of player.

Damage Dealt +50% against Allies/other Players.

Lasts 1 round.

activeEffect.name: Brainwashed
activeEffect.description:
GM takes round instead of player.

Damage Dealt +100% against Allies/other Players.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Bleed
activeEffect.description:
Prevents healing and deals the higher of Health/10 and Health Regen/2 Damage/round.

On enemies, prevents healing and drains Health at a fixed rate/round.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Hemorrhage
activeEffect.description:
Prevents healing and deals the higher of 2 + [Health/10] and 2 + [Health Regen/2] Damage/round.

On enemies, prevents healing and drains Health at a fixed rate +2/round.

Adds Bleed Damage/4 to all Damage Taken from attacks.

On Multihit, only applies on first hit.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Drain
activeEffect.description:
Inverts Stamina/Focus regen rates. If either falls to 0, drains Health instead of that resource.

On enemies, drains Health at a different rate/round than Bleed.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Depletion
activeEffect.description:
Multiplies Stamina/Focus regen rates by 1.5x, then inverts them. If either falls to 0, drains Health instead of that resource.

On enemies, drains Health at a different rate +2/round than Bleed.

Adds Drain Damage/3 ([Stamina + Focus Regen]/3] for players) to all Damage Taken.

On Multihit, only applies on first hit.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Dazed
activeEffect.description: Unused.

activeEffect.name: Staggered
activeEffect.description: Unused.

activeEffect.name: Crash
activeEffect.description:
Prevents Drive generation.

On enemies, deals 10% of Max Break Damage and Burst Damage per round.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Muted
activeEffect.description:
Nullifies effects of Support Skills.

Deals 2 Damage/round for every effect nullified on application, and any others applied over Muted duration.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Rupture
activeEffect.description:
Applied as stacks.

Increases Break Damage/Burst Damage Taken by 3.

[Players, DP] Decreases Drive Gain/increases Purity Loss by 1.

[Players] Decreases Stamina/Focus Regen by 1.

Lasts 1 round.

activeEffect.name: Weakened
activeEffect.description: Prevents dealing Elemental and Effective Damage for 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Panic
activeEffect.description:
Targets nearest ally within Basic Attack range before taking action. (Does not Move user.)

Increases Speed by 3.

Cannot Ebb, Brace, Rest, or Heavy Attack.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Ensnare
activeEffect.description:
Disables Movement from Skills/Weapon Skills.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Dizzy
activeEffect.description:
Prevents usage of Skills/Attacks beyond point blank.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Binds
activeEffect.description:
Applied as stacks. Lowers Move by 2 per stack.

At 5+ Stacks, applies Ensnare.

Stack decrements on Damage Taken and 1 stack per round.

Not transferred by Infection.

activeEffect.name: Stun
activeEffect.description: Cannot act this round.

activeEffect.name: Negative
activeEffect.description:
Switches party alignment.

Allies become enemies, enemies become allies.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Blind
activeEffect.description:
Attacks have a 40% chance to graze, suffering Damage Dealt -50%.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Infection
activeEffect.description:
Anyone who melee attacks/gets melee attacked by infectee, passes an adjacent tile/has their adjacent tile passed by infectee receives all Statuses, Buffs, and Debuffs currently on them, including Infection.

Infection cannot be given to the same person twice.

Does not take a Status Slot.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Basic Counter
activeEffect.description: Retaliates against all attacks with a basic attack.

activeEffect.name: Skill Counter
activeEffect.description: Retaliates against all attacks with a skill attack.

activeEffect.name: Provoke
activeEffect.description:
Forces target to attack user and disables Reactive Attacks against other targets.

Must take shortest path, and must move as close as possible.

On Players, deals Bleed Damage and applies Panic if they refuse to attack target.

May fail against certain targets.

Lasts 1 round.

activeEffect.name: Aggro
activeEffect.description:
Forces target to attack user, unless another ally targets aggroed enemy.

Must take shortest path, and must move as close as possible.

On Players, deals half Bleed Damage and applies Panic if they refuse to attack target.

If applied to a target that already has Aggro towards the attacker, converts Aggro into Provoke.

May fail against certain targets.

Lasts 1 round.

activeEffect.name: Deter
activeEffect.description:
Forces target to not attack user, unless user targets aggroed enemy.

On Players, deals Drain Damage and applies Muted if they attack target.

May fail against certain targets.

Lasts 1 round.

activeEffect.name: Challenge
activeEffect.description:
Forces user and target to only target each other.

If an outsider attempts to intervene, triggers a Death Roll on them.

Can be refused.

activeEffect.name: Overheat
activeEffect.description:
Disables Body Parts and Regen.

Cannot switch out.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Stopped
activeEffect.description: Automatically applied when inflicted with Chilled, its' higher tier forms, and Stun.

activeEffect.name: Sleep
activeEffect.description:
FP -1, enables Health Regen.

All Regens +50%, and restores Purity at a rate of 25%/round.

33% chance to wake up and suffer Damage Taken +100% on attack.

100% chance and Damage Taken +75% on Effective Damage Taken.

33% chance to wake up each round, should Sleeping target want to. Increases by 33% each round.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Link
activeEffect.description:
Stuck adjacent to other targets with Link.

When moving, all adjacent Linked targets move together.

Move -[Number of Linked targets x2].

activeEffect.name: Vanish
activeEffect.description:
Cannot be the Main Target of attacks.

When taking an action, moving adjacent to opponents, or being moved adjacent to by opponents, break Vanish.

activeEffect.name: Charged
activeEffect.description: Cost +50%, Damage Dealt +25%.

activeEffect.name: Data Fragmentation
activeEffect.description:
Damage Dealt +50%.

Increases by 10% each round.

Not transferred by Infection.

activeEffect.name: Fire Resistance Up
activeEffect.description:
Base Fire Resistance is set to 25%. (Semi-Resistance)

Base Resistance increases by 25% per the stack of this effect.

Calculated on the attacker's side.

Is not a Damage Taken +/-X% Effect.

Is not considered a Status.

activeEffect.description:
Base Fire Resistance is set to -25%. (Semi-Weakness)

Base Resistance decreases by 25% per the stack of this effect.

Calculated on the attacker's side.

Is not a Damage Taken +/-X% Effect.

Is not considered a Status.

Base Resistance increases by 25% per the stack of this effect.

Calculated on the attacker's side.

Is not considered a Status.

activeEffect.name: Frost Burn
activeEffect.description:
Burn Status, Frost Status. (2 Tiers)

Deals 4 IceFire Damage/round, disables Shield Health, lowers Move by 2, and Speed by 1. (Min of 1.)

If resistant to only one, applies Neutrally.

If weak to at least one, applies Effectively.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Freeze Blaze
activeEffect.description:
Burn Status, Frost Status. (2 Tiers)

Deals 6 IceFire Damage/round, disables Shield Health, lowers Move by 3, and Speed by 2. (Min of 1.)

If resistant to only one, applies Neutrally.

If weak to at least one, applies Effectively.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Frost Burn Tier 3
activeEffect.description: Unused.

activeEffect.name: Frost Burn Tier 4
activeEffect.description: Unused.

activeEffect.name: Frost Burn Tier 5
activeEffect.description: Unused.

activeEffect.name: Acid Burn
activeEffect.description:
Burn Status, Acid Status. (2 Tiers)

Deals 5% of Max Health in GroundFire Damage/round, increasing by 2.5% each round.

Disables Shield Health.

Flat against bosses, not halved. (Max 15/round against bosses.)

If resistant to only one, applies Neutrally.

If weak to at least one, applies Effectively.

Lasts 4 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Corrosive Blaze
activeEffect.description:
Burn Status, Acid Status. (2 Tiers)

Power -1. Deals 5% of Max Health in GroundFire Damage/round, increasing by 3% each round.

Disables Shield Health.

Flat against bosses, not halved. (Max 25/round against bosses.)

If resistant to only one, applies Neutrally.

If weak to at least one, applies Effectively.

Lasts 4 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Acid Burn Tier 3
activeEffect.description: Unused.

activeEffect.name: Acid Burn Tier 4
activeEffect.description: Unused.

activeEffect.name: Acid Burn Tier 5
activeEffect.description: Unused.

activeEffect.name: Holy Burn
activeEffect.description:
Burn Status. (1 Tier)

Deals 4 Holy Damage/round, prevents dealing Effective Damage, and prevents Healing.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Quick Burn
activeEffect.description:
Special Burn.

When triggering a Burn Status, trigger it twice.

Second trigger always decrements duration, even if first one does not. (Max 3 additional activations/round.)

Does not take a Status Slot.

Expires when Burn Status does.

activeEffect.name: Overstatic
activeEffect.description:
Special Static.

Increases Static Status Damage by the number of times target has been hit this round, then halves this additional value next round.

Does not take a Status Slot.

Expires when Static Status does.

activeEffect.name: Black Frail
activeEffect.description:
Frail Status. (1 Tier)

All hits of attacks suffer 5 Recoil Abnormal Damage.

Lasts 2 rounds.

If affected has a higher tier Frail Status, modifies Frail Status to trigger on "All hits of attacks" instead, does not take a Status Slot and expires when Frail Status does.

activeEffect.name: Gray Frail
activeEffect.description:
Frail Status. (1 Tier)

All attacks suffer 3 Recoil Abnormal Damage.

Prevents using any Unsupport Skills for duration.

Lasts 2 rounds.

If affected has a higher tier Frail Status, adds "Prevents using any Unsupport Skills for duration" to Frail Status instead, does not take a Status Slot and expires when Frail Status does.

activeEffect.name: White Frail
activeEffect.description:
Frail Status. (1 Tier)

Power +3. All attacks suffer 33% Recoil Abnormal Damage.

Prevents using any Support Skills for duration.

Lasts 2 rounds.

If affected has a higher tier Frail Status, adds "Prevents using any Support Skills for duration" to Frail Status instead, does not take a Status Slot and expires when Frail Status does.

activeEffect.name: Burning Bleed
activeEffect.description:
Burn Status, Bleed Status. (2 Tiers)

Prevents healing and deals the higher of Health/10 and Health Regen/2 Fire Damage/round.

On enemies, prevents healing and drains Health at a fixed rate/round in Fire Damage.

Increases Fire Damage Taken by 25%.

Lasts 2 rounds.

Does not increase Fire Damage Taken by Status Effects.

activeEffect.name: Blazing Bleed
activeEffect.description:
Burn Status, Bleed Status. (2 Tiers)

Prevents healing and deals the higher of 2 + [Health/10] and 2 + [Health Regen/2] Fire Damage/round.

On enemies, prevents healing and drains Health at a fixed rate +2/round in Fire Damage.

Increases Fire Damage Taken by 25%.

Lasts 2 rounds.

Does not increase Fire Damage Taken by Status Effects.

activeEffect.name: Burning Drain
activeEffect.description:
Burn Status, Drain Status. (2 Tiers)

Inverts Stamina/Focus regen rates. If either falls to 0, drains Health instead of that resource, as Fire Damage.

On enemies, drains Health at a different rate/round than Bleed, as Fire Damage.

Increases Fire Damage Taken by 25%.

Lasts 2 rounds.

Does not increase Fire Damage Taken by Status Effects.

activeEffect.name: Blazing Drain
activeEffect.description:
Burn Status, Drain Status. (2 Tiers)

Multiplies Stamina/Focus regen rates by 1.5x, then inverts them. If either falls to 0, drains Health instead of that resource, as Fire Damage.

On enemies, drains Health at a different rate +2/round than Bleed, as Fire Damage.

Increases Fire Damage Taken by 25%.

Lasts 2 rounds.

Does not increase Fire Damage Taken by Status Effects.

activeEffect.name: Burning Binds
activeEffect.description:
Bind Infusion.

Applied as stacks. Lowers Move by 2 per stack.

On Stack decrement, deals Burn Damage.

At 5+ Stacks, applies Burn.

If already afflicted with a Burn Status, increases tier of Burn Status. (Once per every 5 Stacks.)

Stack decrements on Damage Taken and 1 stack per round.

Not transferred by Infection.

activeEffect.name: Electric Binds
activeEffect.description:
Bind Infusion.

Applied as stacks. Lowers Move by 2 per stack.

On Stack decrement, deals 4 Thunder Damage.

At 5+ Stacks, applies Static.

If already afflicted with a Static Status, increases tier of Static Status. (Once per every 5 Stacks.)

Stack decrements on Damage Taken and 1 stack per round.

Not transferred by Infection.

activeEffect.name: Thorny Binds
activeEffect.description:
Bind Infusion.

Applied as stacks. Lowers Move by 2 per stack.

On Stack decrement, deals Bleed Damage/2.

At 5+ Stacks, decreases Maximum Health by 10%. (Min 5, Once per every 5 Stacks. Max 30% per target.)

Stack decrements on Damage Taken and 1 stack per round.

Not transferred by Infection.

activeEffect.name: Restraining Binds
activeEffect.description:
Bind Infusion.

Applied as stacks. Lowers Move by 2 per stack.

For each Stack, suffer Damage Dealt -5%.

At 5+ Stacks, applies Weakened.

If already afflicted with Weakened, extend Weakened duration by 2. (Once per every 5 Stacks.)

Stack decrements on Damage Taken and 1 stack per round.

Not transferred by Infection.

activeEffect.name: Blighted Binds
activeEffect.description:
Bind Infusion.

Applied as stacks. Lowers Move by 2 per stack.

On Stack decrement, deals 3 Abnormal Damage.

At 5+ Stacks, applies a random Status Ailment, (excluding Death) then applies Infection.

If already afflicted with Infection, extend Infection duration by 2. (Once per every 5 Stacks.)

Stack decrements on Damage Taken and 1 stack per round.

Not transferred by Infection.

activeEffect.name: Illusory Binds
activeEffect.description:
Bind Infusion.

Applied as stacks. Lowers Move by 2 per stack.

On Stack increment, increases duration of random Status by 1.

At 0 Stacks, halves duration of all Statuses, then deals 10 Absolute Damage.

If no other Statuses are applied at 0 Stacks, does not deal Absolute Damage.

Stack decrements on Damage Taken and 1 stack per round.

Not transferred by Infection.

activeEffect.name: Radiant Binds
activeEffect.description:
Bind Infusion.

Applied as stacks. Lowers Move by 2 per stack.

On Stack decrement, deals 3 Holy Damage.

At 3+ Stacks, also deals 3 Burst Damage on Stack decrement.

Stack decrements on Damage Taken and 1 stack per round.

Not transferred by Infection.

activeEffect.name: Adaptive Binds
activeEffect.description:
Bind Infusion.

Applied as stacks. Lowers Move by 2 per stack.

Active and incoming Bind Infusions will be combined with Adaptive Binds instead of converting Binds.

At 5+ Stacks, applies Static.

After 2 rounds, halves Bind Stacks and removes all Bind Infusions.

Stack decrements on Damage Taken and 1 stack per round.

Not transferred by Infection.

activeEffect.name: Bind Resistance
activeEffect.description:
Halves Move Penalty of Binds.

On application/when Binds are converted into Bind Infusions, blocks conversion, then removes status.

Does not take a Status Slot.

activeEffect.name: Silver Binds
activeEffect.description:
Debuff.

Applied as stacks.

While target has Silver Binds, Binds will not decrement.

On Stack decrement, applies 1 Bind.

If target is Beast-like, applies 2 Binds on Stack decrement instead.

Decrements on Damage Taken and 1 stack per round.

Only 1 Debuff Stack can be applied at the same time.

Not transferred by Infection.

Does not take a Status Slot.

activeEffect.name: Torrent
activeEffect.description:
Rupture Mutation.

Applied as stacks.

Deals 3 Water Damage/Attack, and suffers Damage Dealt -5%.

[DP] Deals 3 Water Damage/Attack, and attacks no longer decrease Purity.

Deals 3 Water Damage/Attack, and attacks no longer deal Break Damage/Burst Damage.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Silenced
activeEffect.description:
Special Weakened.

Prevents applying Statuses and dealing Elemental/Effective Damage for 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Fear
activeEffect.description:
Special Panic.

Disables Reactive Attacks and Counterattacks.

Targets nearest ally within Basic Attack range before taking action. (Does not Move user.)

Increases Speed by 3.

Cannot Ebb, Brace, Rest, or Heavy Attack.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Frenzy
activeEffect.description:
Special Panic.

Power +1. When Skill Attacking, suffer Bleed Damage/2.

Targets nearest ally within Basic Attack range before taking action. (Does not Move user.)

Increases Speed by 3.

Cannot Ebb, Brace, Rest, or Heavy Attack.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Nightmare
activeEffect.description:
Special Sleep.

FP -1, enables and inverts Health Regen.

All Regens +50%, and decrements Purity at a rate of 25%/round.

At 0 Purity, deals Fixed Damage = 33% Max Health, then wakes target up.

On enemies, deals Drain Damage each round, and also deals Fixed Damage = 5% Max Health on the last round, then wakes target up.

33% chance to wake up and suffer Damage Taken +100% on attack.

100% chance and Damage Taken +75% on Effective Damage Taken.

33% chance to wake up each round, should Sleeping target want to. Increases by 33% each round.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Hunger
activeEffect.description:
Vampire/Feast Status.

Area Skills deal -10% Damage for each target in area.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Famine
activeEffect.description:
Vampire/Feast Status.

When using Area Skills, suffer Drain Damage/3 for each target in area.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Thirst
activeEffect.description:
Vampire/Feast Status.

After using an Area Skill, divides self's Bleed Damage value by number of targets hit, then heals targets by that value.

If only 1 target hit, deals Bleed Damage +25% to self instead.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Desire
activeEffect.description:
Vampire/Feast Status.

Increases Damage Taken from Vampires by [10 x Desire Stacks]%.

Does not take a Status Slot.

Does not decrement.

activeEffect.name: Apathy
activeEffect.description:
Vampire/Feast Status.

Decreases Stamina/Focus Regen by the Stack.

On enemies, deals [Stack x2] Abnormal Damage/round.

Cannot gain Desire.

At 3+ Apathy, Basic Armor -1 (Players)/Basic Damage Taken +10% (Enemies).

Does not take a Status Slot.

Does not decrement.

activeEffect.name: Lethal Spikes
activeEffect.description:
Shuriken Weapon Effect.

Status Slots +1, so long as one was applied by the character who applied this Status.

Does not take a Status Slot.

activeEffect.name: Lethal Spikes Plus
activeEffect.description:
Kunai Weapon Effect.

Status Slots +1, so long as one was applied by the character who applied this Status.

All Statuses applied by the character who applied this effect deal 2 Abnormal Damage/round. (Use the stack of this effect to keep track of this.)

Does not take a Status Slot.

activeEffect.name: Light Resistance
activeEffect.description:
Combat Vest Effect.

Reduces first three instances of Damage Taken in encounter by 25%.

+ Increase to 33%.

++ Four instances.

activeEffect.name: Rage
activeEffect.description:
Wild Oak Weapon Material Effect.

Upon dealing damage, increase the Stack.

Upon taking Damage, suffer [Stack x3] Abnormal Damage, then clear Rage Stacks.

Does not decrement per round.

activeEffect.name: Charge [Type A]
activeEffect.description:
Used for certain Skills.

Decrements by 1 when taking Ice Damage.

activeEffect.name: Charge [Type B]
activeEffect.description:
Used for certain Skills.

Decrements by 1 when taking Ice Damage.

activeEffect.name: Anticharge
activeEffect.description:
Used for certain Skills.

Decrements by 1 when taking Ice Damage or Resting.

Cannot decrement below 1.

activeEffect.name: Shift [Fire]
activeEffect.description:
General Effect.

Element is shifted to Fire.

"Horizontal" Element expressed by the stack of this effect.

[1] Fire

[2] Magma

[3] Smoke

[4] Oil

activeEffect.name: Shift [Ice]
activeEffect.description:
General Effect.

Element is shifted to Ice.

"Horizontal" Element expressed by the stack of this effect.

[1] Ice

[2] Water

[3] Steam

[4] Snow

activeEffect.name: Shift [Thunder]
activeEffect.description:
General Effect.

Element is shifted to Thunder.

"Horizontal" Element expressed by the stack of this effect.

[1] Thunder

[2] Magnetic

[3] Energy

[4] Plasma

activeEffect.name: Shift [Air]
activeEffect.description:
General Effect.

Element is shifted to Air.

"Horizontal" Element expressed by the stack of this effect.

[1] Air

[2] Cloud

[3] Storm

[4] Leaf

activeEffect.name: Shift [Ground]
activeEffect.description:
General Effect.

Element is shifted to Ground.

"Horizontal" Element expressed by the stack of this effect.

[1] Ground

[2] Wood

[3] Metal

[4] Clay

activeEffect.name: Reave
activeEffect.description:
Reaver Style Effect.

When a skill is Reaved, it loses all additional effects beyond Base Skill Power and Damage Dealt% Modifiers, and gains a +1 Round Cooldown. (On Players, Cost +2 instead of Cooldown.)

Reaved Skills keep this effect until they are used again, and each Skill can only be Reaved once per encounter.

Does not take a Status Slot.

activeEffect.name: Soul Conversion
activeEffect.description:
Prismatic Blader Style Effect.

Sets target's Element to user's, 2 actions.

Skill Upgrades expressed by the stack of this effect.

[1] Default Soul Conversion

[2] Resistance Conversion

[3] Weakness Conversion

Does not take a Status Slot.

activeEffect.name: Blue Chain
activeEffect.description:
Avenger Style Effect, Mark Type.

Skill Tier expressed by the stack of this effect.

[1] Increases Power of 0th and 1st Skills against target by 3.

[2] Increases Power of 0th and 1st Skills against target by 4.

Only 1 Mark Type can be applied at once. (All Soul Marks count as the same Mark Type.)

Does not take a Status Slot.

activeEffect.name: Red Chain
activeEffect.description:
Avenger Style Effect, Mark Type.

Skill Tier expressed by the stack of this effect.

[1] Increases Minimum Power by Skills against target by 3. Increases Minimum Power by target by 2.

[2] Increases Minimum Power by Skills against target by 4. Increases Minimum Power by target by 3.

Only 1 Mark Type can be applied at once. (All Soul Marks count as the same Mark Type.)

Does not take a Status Slot.

activeEffect.name: Tether [Standard]
activeEffect.description:
Iron Maiden Style Effect, Tether Type.

Transfers 1 Standard Armor from creator to target.

Only 2 Tethers of each type can be applied to a single target at once.

activeEffect.name: Tether [Prismatic]
activeEffect.description:
Iron Maiden Style Effect, Tether Type.

Transfers 1 Prismatic Armor from creator to target.

Only 2 Tethers of each type can be applied to a single at once.

activeEffect.name: Blade for Light
activeEffect.description:
Sword Saint Style Effect.

Base resistances change to that of Light Element.

Take 25% less Damage Dealt from non-Abnormal Elements.

Take 50% less Damage Dealt from Dark.

Take neutral Damage Dealt from Holy.

activeEffect.name: Passion
activeEffect.description:
Sword Saint Style Effect.

On Next Attack, Power +Passion/2, and applies Burn for Passion/2 rounds, then consumes all Passion.

Does not decrement.

activeEffect.name: Seal
activeEffect.description:
Devil Saber Style Effect.

Current unsealed Seals expressed by the stack of this effect.

Seal 1: Deal Effective Damage, Suffer Effective Damage, (EX) Deal at least 15 Damage.

Seal 2: Defeat an Opponent, Ally is Defeated, An enemy suffers at least 2 Status Effects/Ailments simultaneously, (EX) Apply a Status Effect/Ailment to at least (total enemies/3) enemies (Min 1).

Seal 3: An Enemy the Devil Blader has Attacked before is Broken or Bursted, Enter Overdrive/Antidrive, Devil Blader completes a Launch-Smash combo, (EX) Devil Blader deals Level x2 Damage.

Seal 4: Devil Blader falls to 25% Health while under a Status Effect/Ailment, Devil Blader is defeated, Devil Blader has at least 2 negative Status Effects/Ailments on self at once while under 75% Health, (EX) Devil Blader deals at least 80 Damage in encounter

Does not decrement.

activeEffect.name: Demonic Contract: Pride
activeEffect.description:
Demon Lord Style Effect.

Skill Tier expressed by the stack of this effect.

[1] Adds Armor Curse to ally's attacks for the remainder of encounter. Target must now pay half of user's Skill Costs.

[2] Adds Armor Curse+ and Power +1 to ally's attacks for the remainder of encounter. Target must now pay half of user's Skill Costs.

Contracts are Exclusive, only one Contract of each Sin may be equipped among all characters combined in an encounter at once.

Characters cannot have more than one Contract equipped at once.

Contracts cannot be used on other characters with Contracts equipped, or Sword Saints.

Characters with Contract Effects on them gain base Weakness to Holy and base Semi-Weakness to Light, and gain Weakness to Anti-Demonic Attacks.

Lasts remainder of encounter.

activeEffect.name: Temporal Decay
activeEffect.description:
Demon Lord Style Effect.

Moves turn to the end of the round, disables ability to pass turn, and halves Move.

Forces turn to be passed to first character to act last round.

Without Popcorn, deals 3 Dark Damage/round instead of disabling ability to pass turn.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Soul Charge
activeEffect.description:
Spiritualist Charge Type.

Used for certain Skills.

Generate 1 Soul Charge for each hit of Basic Attacks.

All Spiritualists start encounter with 3 Soul Charges.

activeEffect.name: Waltz
activeEffect.description:
Dancer Style Effect, Dance.

Skill Tier expressed by the stack of this effect.

[1] Follows up any attacks by Allies within 4 spaces with a Basic Attack, limited by user's Move.

[2] Follows up any attacks by Allies within 5 spaces with a Basic Attack that deals +2 Damage, limited by user's Move.

Lasts 1 round.

activeEffect.name: Pasodoble
activeEffect.description:
Dancer Style Effect, Dance.

Skill Tier expressed by the stack of this effect.

[1] Redirects non-Heavy, non-Ranged Attacks on Allies within 4 spaces towards user. Evade Chance +10%.

[2] Redirects non-Heavy Attacks on Allies within 5 spaces towards user. Evade Chance +20%.

Lasts 1 round.

activeEffect.name: Quickstep
activeEffect.description:
Dancer Style Effect, Dance.

Skill Tier expressed by the stack of this effect.

[1] Speed +1, Move +3.

[2] Speed +2, Move +4.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Encore
activeEffect.description:
Dancer Style Effect, Dance.

Skill Tier expressed by the stack of this effect.

[1] Extends Buffs on Allies within 4 spaces by 1 round.

[2] Extends Buffs on Allies within 5 spaces by 1 round. Cures Weakened, Panic, Ensnare, Dizzy, and up to 3 stacks of Binds.

2 Round Cooldown.

activeEffect.name: Flamenco
activeEffect.description:
Dancer Style Effect, Dance.

Skill Tier expressed by the stack of this effect.

[1] Allows adjacent allies to act after user, regardless of Speed.

[2] Allows adjacent allies to act after user, regardless of Speed, and grants Elemental Damage Dealt +25%.

Lasts 1 round.

activeEffect.name: Smoke Mark
activeEffect.description:
Soul Breaker Style Effect, Mark Type.

Deals [Stack]% of Health in Fire Damage/round. (Max Damage: 20.)

Does not increase Damage Taken from Soul Mark Effects.

Fire Damage Taken +[3x Stack]%.

Only 10 Soul Marks of each type can be placed on a target at once, although Magnitude can go beyond this limit.

Only 1 Mark Type can be applied at once. (All Soul Marks count as the same Mark Type.)

Does not take a Status Slot.

activeEffect.name: Steam Mark
activeEffect.description:
Soul Breaker Style Effect, Mark Type.

Deals [Stack] Ice Break Damage/round.

Ice Damage Taken +[3x Stack]%.

Does not increase Damage Taken from Soul Mark Effects.

Only 10 Soul Marks of each type can be placed on a target at once, although Magnitude can go beyond this limit.

Only 1 Mark Type can be applied at once. (All Soul Marks count as the same Mark Type.)

Does not take a Status Slot.

activeEffect.name: Energy Mark
activeEffect.description:
Soul Breaker Style Effect, Mark Type.

All attacks suffer [Stack x3]% Recoil Thunder Damage.

Thunder Damage Taken +[3x Stack]%.

Does not increase Damage Taken from Soul Mark Effects.

Only 10 Soul Marks of each type can be placed on a target at once, although Magnitude can go beyond this limit.

Only 1 Mark Type can be applied at once. (All Soul Marks count as the same Mark Type.)

Does not take a Status Slot.

activeEffect.name: Storm Mark
activeEffect.description:
Soul Breaker Style Effect, Mark Type.

Deals [Stack] Air Damage/round. (Max Damage: 10.)

Area Skill Size -[Stack]. (Length/Width Alternating.)

For Radial Area Skills, decreases Radius by 1 for every 2 Storm Marks.

Air Damage Taken +[3x Stack]%.

Does not increase Damage Taken from Soul Mark Effects.

Only 10 Soul Marks of each type can be placed on a target at once, although Magnitude can go beyond this limit.

Only 1 Mark Type can be applied at once. (All Soul Marks count as the same Mark Type.)

Does not take a Status Slot.

activeEffect.name: Metal Mark
activeEffect.description:
Soul Breaker Style Effect, Mark Type.

All incoming Attacks deal +[Stack] Knockback. (Max Knockback: 10.)

Deals 1 Ground Break Damage on Attack for every 3 Knockback from this effect. (Max Break Damage: 15.)

Ground Damage Taken +[3x Stack]%.

Does not increase Damage Taken from Soul Mark Effects.

Only 10 Soul Marks of each type can be placed on a target at once, although Magnitude can go beyond this limit.

Only 1 Mark Type can be applied at once. (All Soul Marks count as the same Mark Type.)

Does not take a Status Slot.

activeEffect.name: Ignition
activeEffect.description:
Trailblazer Charge Type.

Used for certain Skills.

Generate 1 Ignition for when taking Damage from Attacks or Bracing.

Generate 2 Ignition when Resting.

When using an attack with the Combustion Effect, add [Ignition Stacks] Power, then consume all Ignition.

activeEffect.name: Instinct
activeEffect.description:
Exile Charge Type.

Used for certain Skills.

[10 + [5x Highest Armor Value] + [Damage Reduction Percents/2] + Any other sources of Evasion]/5.

At any point, 3 Instinct can be spent to add a single hit Basic Attack to the Exile's attack.

Exiles only gain half the Damage Reduction benefits of Armor Values/Damage Taken Minuses.

Without the Style Passive, Quell Flames, or Exiled Determination, Instinct no longer grants Evasion, and is only used for Basic Attacks/conditionals.

After successfully Evading, halves Instinct.

activeEffect.name: Denial
activeEffect.description:
Exorcist Style Effect, Rite.

Skill Tier expressed by the stack of this effect.

[1] Targets who attacked user while active cannot attack anyone except user for 1 round when it wears off.

[2] Targets who attacked user while active cannot attack anyone except user for 1 round when it wears off. Armor +2, 1 round, after wearing off.

Only 3 Rites can be active at once.

activeEffect.name: Restriction
activeEffect.description:
Exorcist Style Effect, Rite.

Skill Tier expressed by the stack of this effect.

[1] Targets who attacked area while active lose all non-damaging effects of Skills for 1 round when it wears off.

[2] Targets who attacked area while active lose all non-damaging effects of Skills for 1 round when it wears off. Inflicts Power -2 to targets who attacked area, 1 round, after wearing off.

Only 3 Rites can be active at once.

activeEffect.name: Stagnancy
activeEffect.description:
Exorcist Style Effect, Rite.

Skill Tier expressed by the stack of this effect.

[1] Targets who attacked user while active gain 3 Binds when it wears off.

[2] Targets who attacked user while active gain 3 Binds when it wears off. Converts Binds into Restraining Binds.

Only 3 Rites can be active at once.

activeEffect.name: Reduction
activeEffect.description:
Exorcist Style Effect, Rite.

Skill Tier expressed by the stack of this effect.

[1] Targets who attacked user while active suffer Power -1 for 1 round when it wears off.

[2] Targets who attacked user while active suffer Power -2 for 1 round when it wears off. Targets who attacked user cannot deal damage greater than 33% of their target's Max Health in one attack for 1 round when it wears off.

Only 3 Rites can be active at once.

activeEffect.name: Repulsion
activeEffect.description:
Exorcist Style Effect, Rite.

Skill Tier expressed by the stack of this effect.

[1] Targets who attacked area while active cannot enter area for 1 round when it wears off.

[2] Targets who attacked area while active cannot enter area for 1 round when it wears off. (Does nothing if target is out of range.) Applies 2 Binds to targets who attacked area after wearing off.

Only 3 Rites can be active at once.

activeEffect.name: Direction
activeEffect.description:
Exorcist Style Effect, Rite.

Skill Tier expressed by the stack of this effect.

[1] Targets who attacked user while active must move towards user for 1 round when it wears off.

[2] Targets who attacked user while active must move towards user for 1 round when it wears off. Targets who attacked user while active suffer Back Damage Taken +25%, 1 round, after wearing off.

Only 3 Rites can be active at once.

activeEffect.name: Reprisal
activeEffect.description:
Exorcist Style Effect, Rite.

Skill Tier expressed by the stack of this effect.

[1] 33% of Damage Taken while active is dealt to last target attacked when it wears off.

[2] 33% of Damage Taken while active is dealt to last target attacked when it wears off. User heals 50% of Damage Taken while rite was active, after wearing off.

Only 3 Rites can be active at once.

activeEffect.name: Mark [Archer]
activeEffect.description:
Archer Style Effect, Mark Type.

Mark Tier expressed by the stack of this effect.

[1] [Mark] Character who applied Mark gains Damage Dealt +20% against Marked target, and can hit them over walls. All attacks from character that applied Mark against Marked target become Accurate.

[2] [Mark+] Character who applied Marked+ gains Damage Dealt +33% against Marked+ target, and can hit them over walls. All attacks from character that applied Marked+ against Marked+ target become Accurate.

Only 1 Mark Type can be applied at once. (All Soul Marks count as the same Mark Type.)

Does not take a Status Slot.

activeEffect.name: Hyperspeeed
activeEffect.description:
Inazume-Otome Charge Type.

Used for certain Skills.

Speed >5 is converted into Hyperspeed after using the Hyperspeed Skill.

At least 1 Hyperspeed is consumed every time the user attacks a target/takes damage from a target, in the following 2 ways.

Up to 3 Hyperspeed may be consumed when Attacking to add Power +[Hyperspeed Spent].

Up to 3 Hyperspeed may be consumed when taking damage from an Attack, gaining as Damage Taken -[Hyperspeed Spent x10]%.

If neither action is taken in a round, 1 Hyperspeed is converted back into normal Speed if it was not provided by a temporary buff.

At 7+ Hyperspeed, all Skill Costs -2.

activeEffect.name: Debilitating
activeEffect.description:
Serviteur Style Effect.

Skill Tier expressed by the stack of this effect.

[1] [Debilitating] Damage Dealt -10% and disables Reactive Attacks.

[2] [Debilitating+] Power -1, Damage Dealt -10%, and disables Reactive Attacks.

Does not take a Status Slot.

Lasts 1 round.

activeEffect.name: Turret Modifier 1
activeEffect.description:
Metalwork Atelier Turret Modifier.

Turret type expressed by the stack of this effect.

[1] [Metalcraft Laser] Mod: Charging. Power +3, Width +2. Fires every other round.

[2] [Advanced Metalwork Turret] Mod: Precise. Armor Ignore +25%.

[3] [Advanced Metalcraft Mortar] Mod: Heated. Builds Heat. (On Mortar.)

[4] [Perfectwork Turret] Mod: Repeating. 25% chance to hit the same target twice.

activeEffect.name: Turret Modifier 2
activeEffect.description:
Metalwork Atelier Turret Modifier.

Turret type expressed by the stack of this effect.

[1] [Metalcraft Laser] Mod: Binding. Applies 1 Bind.

[2] [Advanced Metalwork Turret] Mod: Greater. Power +1.

[3] [Advanced Metalcraft Mortar] Mod: Rupturing. Applies 1 Rupture.

[4] [Perfectwork Turret] Mod: Intercepting. Instead of firing normally, fires when targets enter/leave range, up to 3 times per round.

activeEffect.name: Turret Modifier 3
activeEffect.description: Unused.

activeEffect.name: Adapt: Swift
activeEffect.description:
Specter Charge Type.

Grants different buffs depending on the stack.

[1] All Specter/Wraith Skills become Swift.

[2] All Specter/Wraith Skills become Swift and gain Early Power +1.

[3] All Specter/Wraith Skills become Instantaneous and gain Early Power +1.

[4, Wraith] All Wraith Skills become Instantaneous and gain Early Power +2.

Early Power: Gain additional Power when acting in the first half of the round.

Increases by 1 when using Adapt after using a Skill that gains an additional effect under Adapt: Swift.

activeEffect.name: Adapt: Suppression
activeEffect.description:
Specter Charge Type.

Grants different buffs depending on the stack.

[1] All Specter/Wraith Skills apply 1 Bind on hit.

[2] All Specter/Wraith Skills apply 1 Bind on hit and don't decrement Binds.

[3] All Specter/Wraith Skills apply 2 Binds on hit and don't decrement Binds.

[4, Wraith] All Wraith Skills apply 2 Binds on hit, don't decrement Binds, and gain Power +1 against targets with Binds.

Increases by 1 when using Adapt after using a Skill that gains an additional effect under Adapt: Suppression.

activeEffect.name: Adapt: Piercing
activeEffect.description:
Specter Charge Type.

Grants different buffs depending on the stack.

[1] All Specter/Wraith Skills pierce 5 spaces.

[2] All Specter/Wraith Skills pierce 8 spaces.

[3] All Specter/Wraith Skills pierce 8 spaces and gain Armor Ignore +25%.

[4, Wraith] All Wraith Skills pierce 10 spaces, gain Armor Ignore +25% and Power +1.

Increases by 1 when using Adapt after using a Skill that gains an additional effect under Adapt: Piercing.

activeEffect.name: Whimsy
activeEffect.description:
Trickster Charge Type.

Increases by 1d3 after succeeding with Whimsical Skills, or 3 after failing Whimsical Skills.

At 7 [Trickster]/10 [Adventurer] Whimsy, converts all Trickster/Adventurer Skills into their Kitsune/Vixen counterparts.

At the start of the round while a Kitsune/Vixen, decrements by 1d2.

Decrements by 2 upon failing Illusory Skills.

activeEffect.name: Heat
activeEffect.description:
Demolitionist Charge Type.

Grants different buffs depending on the stack.

[1] Size +1.

[2] Size +1, applies Burn.

[3] Size +1, Power +1, applies Burn.

[4, Firearms] Size +1, Power +1, applies Blaze.

[5, Firearms] Size +2, Power +2, applies Blaze.

[6, Heated+] Size +2, Power +2, applies Incinerate.

[7, Heated+] Size +3, Power +3, applies Incinerate.

Increases by 1 when using a Heated, Heated+ or Fire Element Skill.

Only Heated+ Skills can generate Heat beyond 5.

Decrements by 1 when Ebbing, Bracing, Resting, using a Skill with the Cooling Attribue, using an Ice/Water Skill, taking Ice/Water Damage from an Attack or Status, or standing in water/something similar.

activeEffect.name: Locked Binds
activeEffect.description:
Warden Style Effect.

While this effect is applied, Binds no longer have an effect, but will not decrement.

Upon using a Skill that applies/converts Binds, or another Skill that Locks Binds, this effect is removed.

This effect is also removed if the target Ebbs, Braces, or Rests.

Does not take a Status Slot.

activeEffect.name: Wetrocks
activeEffect.description:
Warden Style Effect, Debuff Stack.

Damage Taken +[10x Stack]%.

At 7 Stacks, Standard/Prismatic Armor -10% [Enemies]/-3 [Players] for the remainder of encounter. (Once per target per encounter.)

Applied as stacks. Decrements on Damage Taken and 1 stack per round.

Not transferred by Infection.

activeEffect.name: Field Tactics: Balanced
activeEffect.description:
Tactician Style Effect.

Grants different buffs depending on the stack. Stack determined by active party Role distribution at encounter start.

[1] Balanced

  • Starlight Experience +1, Party Limited Skill Uses +1. [All]

[2] Synchronized Unity

  • Skill Mastery +1, Starlight Experience +2, Party Limited Skill Uses +2. [All]

Party Limited Skill Uses+: Grants a singular, shared additional usage of a Limited Skill to all allies. Consumed when any ally uses a Limited Skill after running out of uses.

activeEffect.name: Field Tactics: Attacker
activeEffect.description:
Tactician Style Effect.

Grants different buffs depending on the stack. Stack determined by active party Role distribution at encounter start.

[1] Attacker Favored

  • Rounds 2-4: Attacker Power +1.

  • Rounds 5+/5-6 [Strategist]: Attacker Damage Dealt +20%.

  • Round 7+ [Strategist]: Attacker Power +1, Attacker Damage Dealt +20%.

[2] Attacker Dominated

  • Rounds 2-4

    • Attacker Power +1.

    • Defender Armor -1.

    • Supporter Costs +0.5.

  • Rounds 5+/5-6 [Strategist]

    • Attacker Power +1, Attacker Damage Dealt +20%.

    • Defender Damage Taken +20%.

    • Supporter Costs +1.

  • Round 7+ [Strategist]

    • Attacker Power +2, Attacker Damage +20%.

    • Defender Armor -1, Defender Damage Taken +20%.

    • Supporter Costs +1.5.

[3] Attacker Unity

  • Rounds 2-4: Attacker Power +1, Attacker Damage Dealt +20%.

  • Rounds 5+/5-6 [Strategist]: Attacker Power +2, Attacker Damage Dealt +20%, Attacker Armor -1.

  • Round 7+ [Strategist]: Attacker Power +2, Attacker Damage Dealt +40%, Attacker Armor -1, Attacker Damage Dealt +20%.

activeEffect.name: Field Tactics: Defender
activeEffect.description:
Tactician Style Effect.

Grants different buffs depending on the stack. Stack determined by active party Role distribution at encounter start.

[1] Defender Favored

  • Rounds 2-4: Defender Armor +1.

  • Rounds 5+/5-6 [Strategist]: Defender Damage Taken -20%.

  • Round 7+ [Strategist]: Defender Armor +1, Defender Damage Taken -20%.

[2] Defender Dominated

  • Rounds 2-4

    • Defender Armor +1.

    • Attacker Power -1.

    • Supporter Costs +0.5.

  • Rounds 5+/5-6 [Strategist]

    • Defender Armor +1, Defender Damage Taken -20%.

    • Attacker Damage Dealt -20%.

    • Supporter Costs +1.

  • Round 7+ [Strategist]

    • Defender Armor +2, Defender Damage Taken -20%.

    • Attacker Power -1, Attacker Damager Dealt -20%.

    • Supporter Costs +1.5.

[3] Defender Unity

  • Rounds 2-4: Defender Armor +1, Defender Damage Dealt -20%.

  • Rounds 5+/5-6 [Strategist]: Defender Armor +2, Defender Damage Taken -20%, Defender Power -1.

  • Round 7+ [Strategist]: Defender Armor +2, Defender Damage Taken -40%, Defender Power -1, Defender Damage Dealt -20%.

activeEffect.name: Field Tactics: Supporter
activeEffect.description:
Tactician Style Effect.

Grants different buffs depending on the stack. Stack determined by active party Role distribution at encounter start.

[1] Supporter Favored

  • Rounds 2-4: Supporter Costs -0.5.

  • Rounds 5+/5-6 [Strategist]: Supporter Costs -1.

  • Round 7+ [Strategist]: Supporter Costs -1.5.

[2] Supporter Dominated

  • Rounds 2-4

    • Supporter Costs -1.

    • Attacker Power -1.

    • Defender Armor -1.

  • Rounds 5+/5-6 [Strategist]

    • Supporter Costs -1.5.

    • Attacker Damage Dealt -20%.

    • Defender Damage Taken +20%.

  • Round 7+ [Strategist]

    • Supporter Costs -2.

    • Attacker Power -1, Attacker Damage Dealt -20%.

    • Defender Armor -1, Defender Damage Taken -20%.

[3] Supporter Unity

  • Rounds 2-4: Supporter Costs -1.5.

  • Rounds 5+/5-6 [Strategist]: Supporter Costs -2, Supporter Power -1.

  • Round 7+ [Strategist]: Supporter Costs -2.5, Supporter Power -1, Supporter Armor +1.

activeEffect.name: Field Tactics: Fool
activeEffect.description:
Tactician Style Effect.

Grants different buffs depending on the stack. Stack determined by active party Role distribution at encounter start.

[1] Foolish

  • [All] Skill Mastery +1.

    • Attacker Power -1.

    • Defender Armor -1.

    • Supporter Costs +1.

[2] Fool's Gambit

  • [All] Skill Mastery +1.

    • Fool Power +1, Fool Armor +1, Fool Costs -0.5.

activeEffect.name: Coins
activeEffect.description:
Merchant Resource.

Used for purchase Items.

All Merchants start encounter with 3 Coins.

Coins may be distributed to allies before the encounter starts.

activeEffect.name: Guide
activeEffect.description:
Teacher Style Effect.

Skill Tier expressed by the stack of this effect.

[1] Attacks ignore resistances of up to +50%. Immune to Status Effects.

[2] Attacks ignore resistances of up to +50%. Immune to non-Special Statuses.

Lasts 1 round.

activeEffect.name: Classroom Tactics: On Track
activeEffect.description:
Teacher Style Effect.

Grants different buffs depending on the stack. Stack determined by relative Level compared to active party's average Level at encounter start.

[1] On Track [Level = Average Level]

  • Shooting Stars/Altair Experience +5.

Only gives to one if both are earned in a session.

activeEffect.name: Classroom Tactics: Below Average/Falling Behind
activeEffect.description:
Teacher Style Effect.

Grants different buffs depending on the stack. Stack determined by relative Level compared to active party's average Level at encounter start.

[1] Below Average [Level = Average Level -1]

  • [Teacher] Generates 2 Experience/round.

  • [Professor] Skill Mastery +1, Generates 2 Experience/round.

[2] Falling Behind [Level < Average Level -1]

  • [Teacher] Skill Mastery +1, Generates 2 Experience/round.

  • [Professor] Skill Mastery +2, Experience +1. Generates 2 Experience/round.

Does not stack with other Skill Mastery increases.

activeEffect.name: Classroom Tactics: Above Average/Exemplary!
activeEffect.description:
Teacher Style Effect.

Grants different buffs depending on the stack. Stack determined by relative Level compared to active party's average Level at encounter start.

[1] Above Average [Level = Average Level +1]

  • [Teacher] Post-Encounter Skill Mastery +1. Amateur/Intermediate Skill Mastery +1.

  • [Professor] Post-Encounter Skill Mastery +1. Amateur/Intermediate/Advanced Skill Mastery +1.

[2] Exemplary! [Level > Average Level +1]

  • [Teacher] Post-Encounter Skill Mastery +2.

  • [Professor] Post-Encounter Skill Mastery +2. When gaining Experience, can give it to Below Average/Falling Behind allies instead. (Cannot give to Below Average if any Falling Behind characters present.)

Does not stack with other Skill Mastery increases.

activeEffect.name: Fresa-Tonik
activeEffect.description:
Consumable Effect.

Restores 1 Purity at the start of user's turn, before Overdrive/Antidrive roll.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Ironframe
activeEffect.description:
Consumable Effect.

Knockback +3 on Attacks against Melee/Martial users.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: H.L.G NRG
activeEffect.description:
Consumable Effect.

The stack of this effect increases by 1 each round.

Gain Speed equal to [Stack] each round.

If Speed ever becomes the highest, suffers Speed x2 Absolute Damage, and Stun, then removes this effect.

Cannot enter Reserve Party while this effect persists.

Does not decrement.

Lasts remainder of encounter.

activeEffect.name: The Purple
activeEffect.description:
Consumable Effect.

Whenever Drive or Purity are gained, gain 1 extra, but lose 1 of the other.

Lasts remainder of encounter.

activeEffect.name: Haemorrhaged
activeEffect.description:
Personal Effect.

Break/Burst Damage Taken +3 from character that applied this effect.

Does not take a Status Slot.

activeEffect.name: Iron Roses
activeEffect.description:
Personal Charge Type.

Generate 1 Iron Rose for each hit of Attacks. Generation doubled in Overdrive.

When attacking in Overdrive, can consume Iron Roses to deal Break Damage equal to 2x Iron Roses consumed.

activeEffect.name: Magine Needles
activeEffect.description:
Personal Consumable, Consumable Effect.

Once per round, can consume 1 Magine Needle to gain Critical Chance +(10 x [Rounds used in succession +1])%, Damage Taken +(10 x [Rounds used in succession +1])%, and Speed +[Rounds used in succession] for 1 round.

On failure to consume after consuming prior round, suffer Stun.

Upon consuming at least 1 Magine Needle, cannot enter Reserve Party until Stun expires.

Start encounter with 5 Magine Needles.

activeEffect.name: Mark [Ayano]
activeEffect.description:
Personal Effect, Mark Type.

Character who applied Mark gains Damage Dealt +20% against Marked target, and can hit them over walls. All attacks from character that applied Mark against Marked target become Accurate.

Targets with this Mark can be attacked at double Projectile/Firearm range by all characters allied to the character that applied this Mark.

Only 1 Mark Type can be applied at once. (All Soul Marks count as the same Mark Type.)

Does not take a Status Slot.

activeEffect.name: Flaming Ammo
activeEffect.description:
Labyrinth Effect, Ammo Type.

Ammo. May be consumed on Attack.

If target does not have a Burn Status, applies Burn for 2 rounds.

If target does have a Burn Status, extends duration by 1 instead.

Cannot be Restocked.

activeEffect.name: Freezing Ammo
activeEffect.description:
Labyrinth Effect, Ammo Type.

Ammo. May be consumed on Attack.

If target does not have a Frost Status, applies Frostbite for 2 rounds.

If target does have a Frost Status, extends duration by 1 instead.

Cannot be Restocked.

activeEffect.name: Mark [Rifleman]
activeEffect.description:
Labyrinth Effect, Mark Type.

Characters with this Mark becomes a valid substitute target for "Tracking Shot."

Only 1 Mark Type can be applied at once. (All Soul Marks count as the same Mark Type.)

Does not take a Status Slot.

activeEffect.name: Dragon Ammo
activeEffect.description:
Labyrinth Effect, Ammo Type.

Ammo. May be consumed on Attack.

If target does not have a Burn Status, applies Blaze for 2 rounds.

If target does have a Burn Status, activates Burn Status without decrementing duration.

Cannot be Restocked.

activeEffect.name: HEXA Ammo
activeEffect.description:
Labyrinth Effect, Ammo Type.

Ammo. Can only be consumed for Dead End Bullet.

Ignores Armor and gains Power equal to current round.

activeEffect.name: Magine Needles [Labyrinth]
activeEffect.description:
Labyrinth Consumable, Consumable Effect.

Once per round, can consume 1 Magine Needle to gain Critical Chance +(10 x [Rounds used in succession +1])%, Damage Taken +(10 x [Rounds used in succession +1])%, and Speed +[Rounds used in succession] for 1 round.

On failure to consume after consuming prior round, suffer 50 Break Damage.

Start encounter with 5 Magine Needles.

activeEffect.name: Wounds
activeEffect.description:
Labyrinth Effect.

Increases Bleed Damage by half the stack.

Applied as stacks, halved when afflicted Basic Attacks or Rests.

While suffering this effect, Bleed Statuses cannot be removed, but can still decrement below to 0.

Curable.

Not transferred by Infection.

activeEffect.name: Scrap
activeEffect.description:
Labyrinth Charge Type.

Used for certain Skills.

activeEffect.name: Collected Scrap
activeEffect.description:
Labyrinth Resource.

At the start of the round, target with the most Collected Scrap automatically draws Aggro from Armored Bison.

At the end of encounter, grants Total Collected Scrap/2 Fragments to party.

activeEffect.name: Tether [Effectless]
activeEffect.description:
Labyrinth Tether Type.

Used for certain Skills, but otherwise has no effect. Destroyed when greater than 10 spaces from creator.

activeEffect.name: Unity
activeEffect.description:
Labyrinth Charge Type.

Used for Pair-Up Mechanics.

When taking an action, Unity increases by 1.

When switching, Unity increases by 2. [Twice per encounter.]

When using a Heavy Attack, halve Unity.

Earlier Unity actions may be used at higher Unity.

activeEffect.name: Blooming
activeEffect.description:
Labyrinth Special Burn.

While suffering this effect, Burn Statuses cannot decrement below 1 or be removed.

Whenever Lan attacks, regardless of target, Flip 1 Coin.

  • On Heads: Increase Burn Status duration by 1.

  • On Tails: Activate Burn Status.

Then, decrement Blooming by 1.

Does not take a Status Slot.

activeEffect.name: Mercy of the King
activeEffect.description:
Damage Dealt +25%, Break/Burst Damage Dealt +5.

The King offers Mercy... Do you take it?

Does not take a Status Slot.

Lasts 1 round.

activeEffect.name: Rocks
activeEffect.description:
Labyrinth Resource.

Used to fire the Ballista.

activeEffect.name: Wood
activeEffect.description:
Labyrinth Resource.

Used to fire the Ballista.

activeEffect.name: Crystal Shards
activeEffect.description:
Labyrinth Resource.

Used to fire the Ballista.
